recommendations.title: Topical benzoyl peroxide (2.5–5%)
recommendations.summary: Apply a thin layer once daily at night; watch for irritation and avoid mucous membranes.
recommendations.when_to_see_doctor: If lesions worsen after 6–8 weeks, involve nodules, or lead to scarring, seek dermatology review.

recommendations.title: Urgent in-person dermatology assessment
recommendations.summary: Lesions suspicious for melanoma require timely face-to-face evaluation and possible biopsy.
recommendations.when_to_see_doctor: Aim for specialist review within 2 weeks, or sooner if rapid growth, bleeding, or color change.
